reviews.text: In our bathroom on the ground floor the bathroom smelled of mold all though nothing showed, and very thing appeared to be clean. Everything else was minimalistic and clean with a pine look not very Mexican at all. French balcony with some fresh air. Just a very few steps from the town square with restaurants. Good for touring the "Cols" in the area.
reviews.title: Moldy smell in bathroom

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very French hotel let down by amenities expected of 3 *. Safe dose not take laptops, threadbare towels, not tea and coffee facilities. Poor beds and pillows lead to poor sleep, run down appearance of the rooms. Nice Mexican decorations in corridors and bathroom amenities. Avoid if you want a comfortable nights sleep.
reviews.title: Poor quality for the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for just one night, should have made it longer.
reviews.title: Very pleasant hotel with excellent views

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Comfortable room had a balcony with two chairs, table, flower box and magnificent views. Room had a tv, fridge, bathroom with shower/bath, haridryer etc. Not a huge room but more than adequate. Lots of wardobe/storage space.
reviews.title: Good touring hotel in excellent location
